name: Names are Hard (part5)
description:
Scan the world to find undiscovered compound.

This was a PB & Jam entry.    

Of the four buttons on the side of the screen Only one of them does anything.

The top one was for Analysis mode which you are in by default.     The other two buttons were for adding force emitters and transmutation.   Sadly I ran out of time before fully implementing these.   You can see some pre-setup force emitters in the top left of the map.  The plan was to be able to move these and change their charge level.

All in all I'm pleased with this as a solo effort.
